ingredients.item: 150g dark chocolate (70% cocoa), broken into small pieces

instructions.step: Melt the chocolate and butter in a bowl set over a pan of barely simmering water, stirring occasionally. Set aside to cool slightly.

Put the egg yolks and 1 tbsp sugar in a clean bowl; set over a pan of barely simmering water. Use electric beaters to whisk for 3-4 minutes, until pale. Take off the heat; stir in the chocolate mixture.

In a separate bowl, whisk the egg whites to stiff peaks with a pinch of salt. Beat in the remaining 2 tbsp sugar until stiff and glossy. Fold 1/3Â of this into the chocolate mixture to loosen, then carefully fold in the remaining egg white, a third at a time, trying to retain in much air as possible. Tip into 4 glasses or ramekins (about 175ml capacity) and chill for at least 4 hours, until set, before serving.
